channel.title: CVE Feed for Open-Xchange -- dnsdist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open-Xchange -- dnsdist

item.title: CVE-2016-7069|2024-08-06T01:50:47.438Z -- open-xchange -- dnsdist
item.description: An issue has been found in dnsdist before 1.2.0 in the way EDNS0 OPT records are handled when parsing responses from a backend. When dnsdist is configured to add EDNS Client Subnet to a query, the response may contain an EDNS0 OPT record that has to be removed before forwarding the response to the initial client. On a 32-bit system, the pointer arithmetic used when parsing the received response to remove that record might trigger an undefined behavior leading to a crash.
